name: Cut Ropes
description:
Cut the rope as many as you can!!!


The cut rope game has evolved into a hyper-casual game that anyone can enjoy.

Cut the rope by pulling it with automatic moving scissors.

Enjoy addictive games from simple control and exciting beats

Achieve your best score!

[Game Features]
- Simple Rules of Hyper Casual Games
- Play anytime, anywhere with no time limit!
- You can play without internet.
- Feel free to download with a low capacity game of 30M or less!
- Tablet support
- Gamecenter function support

[Precautions]
1. Data is initialized when the mobile phone is replaced or when the application is deleted.
2. Partial Paid Items and Ads.
